Kard - Senior Software Engineer(s) - New York City, NY - Onsite - Full time - Competitive Salaries + Equity

At Kard, we are using an innovative approach to rewards to help consumers earn the most out of their credit card rewards programs. We are also helping transform loyalty for banks, already working with some of the largest financial institutions in the world. We integrate our loyalty program directly into a financial institution's credit card products, allowing their customers to earn extra points cash back or miles at any of our thousands of retail parters, whether they are shopping online, in-store or on their phone.

Our Engineering team is growing and we are looking to hire some key engineers to the following roles:

Senior DevOps Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/getkard/6125dc7d-fa3f-4020-a7e2-53a458...

Senior Software Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/getkard/5f40a4a6-ae8e-4c03-b5aa-e04998...

Please see the descriptions above and shoot over your CV/Resume to dan@getkard.com if you are interested!!
